SEARCH
Package userInterface

Class DoctorUI

java.lang.Object
userInterface.DoctorUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
CommonMenu, DoctorMenu
public class DoctorUI extends Object implements DoctorMenu
The class implements the DoctorMenu interface to provide a UI for doctors. This class allows the doctor to manage their medical records, schedule, and appointments. It implements the methods defined in DoctorMenu.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    DoctorUI(Doctor doctor, MedicalRecInterface medicalRecInterface, ScheduleInterface scheduleInterface, DocApptInterface docApptInterface, LeaveInterface leaveInterface)
    Constructs a DoctorUI instance for a specific doctor.

    • manageLeave

      public void manageLeave(Scanner sc)
      Displays and manages the Leave Management menu.

      This method provides options to apply for leave, update or remove leave requests, view pending requests, and check the outcome of leave requests.

      Parameters:
      sc - A Scanner object for user input.
